flawed_nl_solution:
There are 50*0.2=<<50*0.2=10>>10 houses buying from him per day
Of those 10/2=<<10/2=5>>5 buy each type of knife set
So he gets 5*50=$<<5*50=250>>250 per day from the cheap set
He also gets 5*150=$<<5*150=750>>750 from the expensive set
So he makes a total of 250+750=$<<250+750=1000>>1000 per day
That means he makes 1000*5=$<<1000*5=50000>>50000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5000.0, not 50000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
